初遇.encontent:
Hey, why are you here? ... Wait, does it mean Sonetto
 is also ...
初遇.content:
喂，你为什么会在这里？！……等等，这是不是说明十四
行诗也……

箱中气候.encontent: The glorious sun, as bright as Matilda! Huh, any problem?
箱中气候.content:
美妙的太阳，就像玛蒂尔达一样耀眼的太阳！怎么？你有
意见吗？

致未来.encontent:
The Great Matilda will become the Foundation's best on-site investigator
 ever. Together with her assistant Sone ... they will excel at
 all missions assigned.
致未来.content:
伟大的玛蒂尔达同学将成为基金会历史上最好的外派调查
员，和她的助手十四一起，出色地完成了所有的任务。

孑立.encontent:
Matilda is now available. Feel free to ask her anything
 ... Ahem! Did you hear me?
孑立.content:
玛蒂尔达现在很有空，你有什么问题都可以来问她了……咳
咳！听到了吗？

问候.encontent:
Knock first! Now walk out and wait till I say "Come
 in please"!
问候.content:
进门之前，请先敲门！退出去再来一次，等我说“请进”之
后再进来！

朝晨.encontent:
You have no taste in food. Say, baguette tastes fabulous
 only with Beurre maitre d'hotel. Watch me and learn,
 come on!
朝晨.content:
你们对食物缺乏灵感，比方说，法式面包只有配上蒜香黄
油，才能发挥出美妙的香气。看看我是怎么做的，来！

信任-朝晨.encontent:
The silk scarf kinda fits your shirt. Nice. Please maintain the
 great taste for lifestyle and always keep in mind that you are
 working with the monitor assistant Matilda!
信任-朝晨.content:
今天这条丝巾很衬你的衬衫，选得好。请继续保持这样高
品位的生活方式，时刻谨记你可是在与协助教员玛蒂尔达
同行！

夜暮.encontent:
Bougies parfumées, thym, sauge ... Super. Décoration
 terminée.  Oh boule de crystal, montre-moi l'avenir,
 s'il te plaît ...
夜暮.content:
熏香蜡烛、百里香、鼠尾草……很好，布置完成了。水晶
球啊，请给予我答案……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Matilda is of course the best. Huh. She's even the
 first one who gets into bed!
信任-夜暮.content:
玛蒂尔达当然是第一名，哼哼，就连睡觉，也是第一个钻
进床铺的！

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Listen, if you have anything unclear, come to the Great
 Matilda. No matter arcanum or things in the outside
 world, Matilda is omniscient.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
听好了，假如你有什么不懂的问题，都可以来问了不起的
玛蒂尔达。不管是神秘学还是外面的世界，我都无所不知
，无所不晓！

袖与手.encontent:
Si douce, si délicate comme un doux rêve ... ses mains
 sont comme de la barbe à papa ... What ... what are
 you looking at! You didn't hear anything!
袖与手.content:
又光滑，又柔软，在梦里……她的手就像棉花糖……看，看
我做什么！你什么都没听到！

衣着与身形.encontent:
Don't get carried away! I am the monitor assitant!
 Someday ... someday Sonetto will become my assistant
 ...
衣着与身形.content:
你不要太得意！我现在也是协助教员了！早晚——早晚十
四行诗会过来当我的助手……

嗜好.encontent:
Sonetto? Why do you suddenly mention that annoying
 gal? Ahem, listen, the best student could only be
 me! I will definitely best her!
嗜好.content:
十四行诗？你怎么突然提起那个讨厌的家伙了？咳咳，听
好了，第一名只能是我，她迟早会被我打败。

赞赏.encontent:
The Great Monitor Matilda highly recognizes you. And
 you ... can be really proud of that.
赞赏.content:
伟大的教员玛蒂尔达，给予了你高度的赞扬……而你，大
可以对此感到自豪。

亲昵.encontent:
Huh, the best student Matilda kindly offers you, the
 worst student, the honor to hang out with her ...
 Enjoy.
亲昵.content:
哼，第一名的玛蒂尔达，给了垫底的你与她一起出去玩的
荣誉……尽管高兴吧。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Why are you so very special? Why is Sonetto willing
 to be your assistant? You were my subordinate when
 we were at school!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
你究竟有什么不一样的地方呢？十四行诗为什么甘心当你
的助手？明明在学校的时候你是我的“下级”才对！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
The nature of divination is deduction based on reality
 ... It is not always correct, but I surely am.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
占卜的本质是基于现行一切的推演……它并非永远正确，只
不过，我总是对的。

独白.encontent:
It's dangerous to be a foreteller. My mum used to hold my hands
 and tell me that I'll be free from danger only if I've taken
 complete command of foreseeing.  I didn't understand her but
 luckily I was always the best student. Jusqu'à, jusqu'à ...
独白.content:
预言是一个危险的能力，妈妈拉着我的手说我必须完全掌
握它，才能不为自己带来危险，我不明白她的意思，但好
在我总是第一名。直到，直到……

战前.encontent: Time to present the marvelous Matilda Bouanich!
战前.content: 让他们领教一下玛蒂尔达·布翁尼小姐的能力！

择选咒语Ⅰ.encontent: I know how to do it.

择选咒语Ⅱ.encontent: Don't tell me what to do.

择选高阶咒语.content: 最棒的，最好的，玛蒂尔达！

择选至终的仪式.encontent: I can see, I am able to see clearly ...
择选至终的仪式.content: 我能看见，我能够很清楚地看见……

战斗胜利.encontent: Vive la France, Vive la Matilda! Ha ha!
战斗胜利.content: 法兰西万岁，玛蒂尔达万岁，哈哈～

洞悉之底.encontent:
Aujourd'hui, Matilda la surdouée domine le monde entier
 ... en tant que meilleure élève.
洞悉之底.content:
天才的玛蒂尔达，于今天让世界臣服在她的脚下……以第
一名的成绩。
